Package Collecto

Class Global

  • java.lang.Object
    • Collecto.Global
  • public class Global
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods, classes and a delimiter, which are used by multiple other methods. It is meant to be used by different classes to provide static and miscellaneous functions to the caller. It is used mostly in Server, PlayerHandler, Client and ClientController.
    See Also:
    Server, PlayerHandler, Client, ClientController

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Global.Protocol
      This class contains classes holding strings that are used often in the entirety of the Collecto program, as well as the TYPE_HELP string which contains a statement referring to the help menu in clients.

    • Method Detail

      • isPushValid

        public static boolean isPushValid​(int push)
        Determines whether a move is within the limits of the board.
        Parameters:
        push - move in push form
        Returns:
        true if 0 <= push <= 27

      • parsePush

        public static java.lang.Integer parsePush​(java.lang.String stringPush)
        Parses the String of a move in push form to an integer, and checks if that push is valid.
        Parameters:
        stringPush - push in String form
        Returns:
        integer of push if it is valid, or null

      • checkAddress

        public static java.net.InetAddress checkAddress​(java.lang.String ip)
        Checks whether a given String IP is correct and returns it as an InetAddress.
        Parameters:
        ip - IP address given in String form
        Returns:
        InetAddress of IP if it is valid, null if it is not

      • checkPort

        public static java.lang.Integer checkPort​(java.lang.String stringPort)
        Checks to see if the String of a port is correct and in use, and returns it as an Integer.
        Parameters:
        stringPort - String of the port
        Returns:
        Integer if the port is usable, otherwise null

      • parseInt

        protected static java.lang.Integer parseInt​(java.lang.String string)
        Parses a String to an Integer.
        Parameters:
        string - given String
        Returns:
        Integer if the String can be parsed, or null
